tldr: `github.com/zalando/skipper` has a `polyfill[.]io` script link in its documentation, this library was taken over by attackers and serves malicious code.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges and if you are hosting the documentation site.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/zalando/skipper` library to the patch version.
